TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebAuditEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent

summary.span: 做為所有 ASP.NET 健康監視稽核事件的基底類別。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all ASP.NET health-monitoring audit events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓生產環境和作業人員管理已部署的 Web 應用程式。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健康情況事件型別。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 類別是 ASP.NET 健康監視稽核事件類別衍生自的基底類別。The class is the base class from which the ASP.NET health-monitoring audit-event classes derive. 稽核事件產生 Web 應用程式中的安全性相關作業的相關資訊，並提供每個稽核的作業成功和失敗的事件。The audit events generate information about security-related operations in a Web application and provide both a success and failure event for each audited operation. 健全狀況監視系統可以稽核成功和失敗的事件，這表示應用程式可以監視的正常和異常狀況。The health-monitoring system can audit both successful and unsuccessful events, which means an application can be monitored for both normal and malfunctioning conditions. 根據預設，只有在失敗稽核事件記錄。By default, only the failure audit events are recorded. 下列作業由 ASP.NET，進行稽核，並且可能會產生健康監視稽核事件的成功或失敗：The following operations are audited by ASP.NET, and may generate success-or-failure health-monitoring audit events: - 在 ASP.NET 應用程式的使用者所進行的登入嘗試。Login attempts made by users of an ASP.NET application. 如需進一步瞭解此稽核的詳細資訊，請參閱和。For more details about this auditing, see and . - 安全性相關事件，例如驗證失敗，失敗的資源的存取嘗試，以及其他安全性相關的事件。Security-related events, such as authentication failures, failed resource access attempts, and other security-related events. 調查入侵或攻擊應用程式時，這些事件的記錄檔可以是很有用。The log of these events can be useful when investigating an intrusion or attack on the application. 根據預設，不提供任何稽核的支援授權失敗的匿名使用者。By default, no auditing support is provided for authorization failures of anonymous users. 如需進一步瞭解失敗事件稽核的詳細資訊，請參閱和。For more details about failure event audits, see and . - ASP.NET 應用程式所引發的自訂事件。Custom events raised by an ASP.NET application. 您可以藉由延伸所提供的功能來稽核自訂事件類別和衍生的類別You can audit custom events by extending the functionality provided by the class and derived classes > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下您將實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，您會指定中的值，以便控制健全狀況監視系統`healthMonitoring`組態區段。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視的型別，來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 如需範例的衍生自類別，請參閱本主題中提供的範例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何衍生自類別來建立自訂的稽核事件。The following code example shows how to derive from the class to create a custom audit event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent/CS/webauditevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent/VB/webauditevent.vb#1)] 以下是組態檔，可讓 ASP.NET 可以使用事件的摘錄。The following is an excerpt of the configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use the event. ``` ```

span.para: 格式化時顯示您自訂事件的資訊，覆寫方法而非方法。這可避免覆寫或竄改機密的系統資訊。
When formatting your custom event information for display, override the method rather than the method. This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 狀況監控系統是在內部使用這個建構函式。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 您永遠不會使用它來具現化物件，但是您可以呼叫這個建構函式實作您自己的事件類型繼承自這個類別時。You will never use it to instantiate a object, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個建構函式。The following code example shows how to call this constructor. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent/CS/webauditevent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent/VB/webauditevent.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 狀況監控系統是在內部使用這個建構函式。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 您永遠不會使用它來具現化物件，但是您可以呼叫這個建構函式實作您自己的事件類型繼承自這個類別時。You will never use it to instantiate a object, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個建構函式。The following code example shows how to call this constructor. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent/CS/webauditevent.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent/VB/webauditevent.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用所提供的資訊屬性中探索功能有問題的原因的協助。Use the information provided by the property to help in the discovery of the causes of a malfunction. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得要求資訊透過屬性。The following code example shows how to obtain request information through the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent/CS/webauditevent.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent/VB/webauditevent.vb#5)]
